steps.name: Given I have a clean namespace
And I have a service called 'entando-k8s-service'
And I have configured a ProvidedCapability for SSO in the namespace
And I have created an EntandoApp custom resource
And I have created an EntandoPlugin custom resource
When I create an EntandoAppPluginLink to link the two custom resources
Then I can successfully access the Plugin's health URL from the EntandoApp's hostname

labels.name: feature
labels.value: As an Entando Operator users, I want to use a Docker container to process an EntandoAppPluginLink so that I don't need to know any of its implementation details to use it.
